JobFullDesc:
Digital Product is seeking a Sr Program Manager to build the future of our Experience Platform and Design System! Our focus is to accelerate the delivery of value to our consumers in a personalized & relevant way. This candidate should have a strong desire to build sustainable and scalable software and the ability to evangelize the adoption of it through positive working relationships.

Additional characteristics that will enable success


Leadership skills to strengthen multiple project teams to successful outcomes, while balancing internal & external partner expectations
Ability to work cross functionally and drive clarity of scope, create plans and follow-through on delivery.
You have a deep understanding of what it takes to deliver programs and/or ship software iteratively; experienced in guiding scrum and/or Kanban teams through estimating, refinement, retrospectives, user story writing, release planning and other ceremonies
In collaboration with engineering, product and design teams, you will guide the discovery, planning, building, launching and evaluation of features that deliver results for Outcome-based Roadmaps
Ability to work cross functionally and drive clarity of scope, build plans and follow-through on delivery.
Comfortable speaking with multiple partners at varying levels
Experience in using qualitative and quantitative data to advise recommendations
Positive teammate who empowers Agile squads and understand the collective success of the team while motivating for delivery
Outstanding collaboration, listening, written and verbal communication skills; Consultancy approach to your work.
Comfortable working in a very fast-paced, results-oriented environment
Passion for delivering extraordinary experiences and products to all athletes*


WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

As a Sr Program Manager, you will be leading critical Platform deliverables and their adoption by working cross functionally with Agile squads, Digital Product, and Design to ultimately enable a best in experience for our consumers. You will instill a positive team culture across all partners, encouraging teams around a common goal of fueling innovation in Nike Direct.

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

This role will report directly into a Director of Program Management under the Digital Product organization, and will belong to the broader Nike Direct Digital Product team. You will partner closely Product Directors, Engineering Directors and Agile squads to deliver Program Epics and Features. Above all, you will be a steadfast champion for the needs of our Digital consumers.
